title: I need a document saying that the Google Pixel G-2PW4100 is capable of Cell broadcasting
content: I'm trying to import a Google Pixel to my country, Peru, and my local authorities are asking me for a document saying that the Google Pixel G-2PW4100 is capable of Cell broadcasting. It's the last think I need to get the permission for importing that Pixel. Can you please help me with it?
